name: Barbarian
description: A fierce warrior who can enter a rage to gain immense power.

subclasses.name: Path of the Berserker
subclasses.description: Driven by a fury that makes them reckless and deadly in combat.

subclasses.name: Path of the Totem Warrior
subclasses.description: Draws spiritual strength from a totem animal spirit.

name: Bard
description: An inspiring magician whose power echoes the music of creation.

subclasses.name: College of Lore
subclasses.description: Knowledge is power, and you hoard it like treasure.

subclasses.name: College of Valor
subclasses.description: A warrior-skald who inspires through martial prowess.

name: Cleric
description: A priest who channels divine magic from a deity.

subclasses.name: Knowledge Domain
subclasses.description: Master of divine knowledge and secrets.

subclasses.name: Life Domain
subclasses.description: The ultimate healer and protector of life.

subclasses.name: Light Domain
subclasses.description: Wielder of radiant flame and truth.

subclasses.name: Nature Domain
subclasses.description: Guardian of the natural world and its cycles.

subclasses.name: Tempest Domain
subclasses.description: Channeler of storms and destructive divine power.

subclasses.name: Trickery Domain
subclasses.description: Master of deception and misdirection through divine magic.

subclasses.name: War Domain
subclasses.description: Divine warrior who embodies the glory of battle.

name: Druid
description: A priest of the Old Faith, wielding the powers of nature.

subclasses.name: Circle of the Land
subclasses.description: Connected to a specific terrain and its natural magic.

subclasses.name: Circle of the Moon
subclasses.description: Master of Wild Shape and animal forms.

name: Fighter
description: A master of martial combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor.

subclasses.name: Champion
subclasses.description: Simple, effective, and devastating in combat.

subclasses.name: Battle Master
subclasses.description: Master of combat maneuvers and tactical superiority.

subclasses.name: Eldritch Knight
subclasses.description: Spellblade warrior who combines martial prowess with arcane magic.

name: Monk
description: A master of martial arts, harnessing ki to perform superhuman feats.

subclasses.name: Way of the Open Hand
subclasses.description: Traditional monk techniques for unarmed combat mastery.

subclasses.name: Way of Shadow
subclasses.description: Ninja-like stealth and teleportation through darkness.

subclasses.name: Way of the Four Elements
subclasses.description: Elemental manipulation through disciplined ki control.

name: Paladin
description: A holy warrior bound by sacred oaths.

subclasses.name: Oath of Devotion
subclasses.description: The classic knight in shining armor, protector of the innocent.

subclasses.name: Oath of the Ancients
subclasses.description: Guardian of nature and light against corruption.

subclasses.name: Oath of Vengeance
subclasses.description: Relentless hunter of evil and injustice.

name: Ranger
description: A warrior who uses martial prowess and nature magic to combat threats.

subclasses.name: Hunter
subclasses.description: Expert at taking down large foes and protecting the wilds.

subclasses.name: Beast Master
subclasses.description: Commands an animal companion as a trusted ally.

name: Rogue
description: A sneaky and resourceful scoundrel who excels at stealth and precision.

subclasses.name: Thief
subclasses.description: Master of stealth and thievery, expert at using items.

subclasses.name: Assassin
subclasses.description: Deadly killer specializing in ambushes and surprise attacks.

subclasses.name: Arcane Trickster
subclasses.description: Rogue with illusion and enchantment magic.

name: Sorcerer
description: A spellcaster who draws power from innate magical blood.

subclasses.name: Wild Magic
subclasses.description: Magic surges with chaotic energy, unpredictable and dangerous.

subclasses.name: Draconic Bloodline
subclasses.description: Descended from dragons, with scales and breath-like power.

name: Warlock
description: A wielder of magic derived from a pact with an otherworldly being.

subclasses.name: The Archfey
subclasses.description: Mischievous and powerful fey patron of the wilderness.

subclasses.name: The Fiend
subclasses.description: Pact with a powerful infernal being of the lower planes.

subclasses.name: The Great Old One
subclasses.description: Mind-shattering cosmic entity beyond mortal comprehension.

name: Wizard
description: A scholarly magic-user capable of manipulating the structures of reality.

subclasses.name: School of Abjuration
subclasses.description: Protector and warder, master of defensive magic.

subclasses.name: School of Conjuration
subclasses.description: Summoner of creatures and objects from other planes.

subclasses.name: School of Divination
subclasses.description: Seer of the future and master of information gathering.

subclasses.name: School of Enchantment
subclasses.description: Manipulator of minds and emotions through magic.

subclasses.name: School of Evocation
subclasses.description: Master of destructive and healing magic.

subclasses.name: School of Illusion
subclasses.description: Master of deception and misdirection through phantasms.

subclasses.name: School of Necromancy
subclasses.description: Master of death, undeath, and life force manipulation.

subclasses.name: School of Transmutation
subclasses.description: Alterer of matter and form through magical transformation.
